name: Summarize Calls & Notify Teams via HubSpot, Slack, Email, WhatsApp

user.name: Encoresky
user.bio:
Need workflow from scratch or optimise and update existing? Please connect at 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/maheshpatidar13/
or mail me at mahesh.patidar@encoresky.com

description:
This workflow automates the process of handling conversation transcriptions and distributing key information across your organization. Here's what it does:

**Trigger:** The workflow is initiated via a webhook that receives a transcription (e.g., from a call or meeting).

**Summarization & Extraction:** Using AI, the transcription is summarized, and key information is extracted ‚Äî such as action items, departments involved, and client details.

**Department Notifications:** The relevant summarized information is automatically routed to specific departments via email based on content classification.

**CRM Sync:** The summarized version is saved to the associated contact or deal in HubSpot for future reference and visibility.

**Multi-Channel Alerts: **The summary is also sent via WhatsApp and Slack to keep internal teams instantly informed, regardless of platform.

**Use Case:**
Ideal for sales, customer service, or operations teams who manage client conversations and want to ensure seamless cross-departmental communication, documentation, and follow-up.

**Apps Used:**

Webhook (Trigger)

OpenAI (or other AI/NLP for summarization)

HubSpot

Email

Slack

WhatsApp (via Twilio or third-party provider)

parameters.content:
## Router agent
Makes decisions with the help of an LLM  
- Analyzes the content
- Decides which part of the transcript is relevant to the different departments
- Sends the emails to the departments

nodes.name: Router Agent
nodes.notes: Route the client feedback topics to the relevant department

values.prompt:
=Summarize the following Converstaion in 2-3 sentences:

"{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body['Client Conversation'] }}"

Just output the summarized conversation and nothing else. Use the same language as the input

parameters.content:
## Set emails here
For each responsible person

## Webhook 
To be used to send the transcription.

## Save transcription to Hubspot
- Search for the client ID based on his email
- Upload the summarized conversation as meeting notes

## Send the summary to Slack and WhatsApp
- Configure Slack Channel
- Configure WhatsApp Recepient

nodes.name: HubSpot Save Notes
nodes.notes: Add meeting notes in the contact form
